title: 我1.7.10玩化学MOD总是崩溃
author: yuang_zi_dang
txt_content: 但是可以启动游戏  创造以拿化学MOD里的物品就崩溃！

replies.author: 时透无一年
replies.txt_content: 崩溃总得给崩溃日志吧

replies.author: yuang_zi_dang
replies.txt_content:
